Class Edge<T, U>

Represents an edge in a graph, connecting two vertices and having a cost associated with it.

Inheritance

Syntax
public class Edge<T, U>
    where U : IComparable<U>
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of the vertices connected by the edge.
U

The type of the cost associated with the edge.
